author: nurfikri89
body:
#### PR description:
This PR updates JMENano to be compatible with Run-3 data and MC, starting with the upcoming NanoAODv10 production. The following major changes are made: 

- `Sequences` have been changed to `Tasks` and JMENano can now run in Prompt.
- Updated names of NanoAOD-related config files and modules.
- Add a dedicated function for reclustering and content customisation of AK4 Puppi jets.
- Recluster both AK4 CHS and AK4 Puppi jet collections but modify their table names and content depending on era (i.e Run-2 or Run-3).
- The JMENano workflows are enabled back again, which was disabled by PR #35140

#### PR validation:
- passes the (re-enabled) JMENano workflows: `runTheMatrix.py -i all --ibeos -l 10224.15,11024.15,25202.15`
[resources_cpu_MC22_122_TTTo2J1L1Nu_jmenano.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/9284309/resources_cpu_MC22_122_TTTo2J1L1Nu_jmenano.pdf)

With this PR, the event size is 6.33 kb/event. Test was done using 10K events from a TTTo2J1L1Nu Run3Winter22MiniAOD file. Below is the CPU time:

![jmenano_cputtime](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5868678/183493190-05906923-f026-413b-af3b-dcaa06eb55c9.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Once merged, this PR needs to be backported to 12_4_X for the JMENanoAODv10 production.
title: [JMENanoAOD] Updates for Run-3
